prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with a knightly appearance and a shiny silver exterior.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that has a tough shell and sharp appendages for combat.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a knight with a lance, featuring bright red and gray colors.
Design a Pokemon with a sturdy build and a helmet-like head, perfect for defense.
Generate a creature that combines the elegance of a knight with the toughness of steel.
Give me a Pokemon that is both a bug and steel type, with distinctive armor plating.
Make a Pokemon with dual sharp horns and a formidable stance, showcasing strength and determination.
